At this Summit, marking 10th anniversary of #EUChina Comprehensive Strategic Partnership, we have agreed on EU-China 2020 Strategic Agenda.
#Greengrowth and #innovation are at the centre of the #EU2020 Strategy, Chinese 12th 5 year plan & decisions by the Third Plenum. #EUChina
Alongside the #EUChina Summit, we have launched a new High Level Dialogue on #Innovation Cooperation.
今年正好是中欧全面战略伙伴关系建立十周年，在今天的中欧领导人会晤时，双方就中欧2020战略议程达成一致。
#绿色增长#和#创新#是中欧2020战略议程的中心议题，也是中国的十二五计划以及十八届三中全会决议的中心议题。#中欧关系#
Trade & investment remain high on #EUChina agenda; today's launch of negotiations on an investment agreement is substantial step forward.
Level playing field, transparency & confidence in rule of law are essential on both sides for business to thrive. #EUChina
Today we discussed protection of minorities & freedom of expression, especially regarding defenders of #humanrights. #EUChina
We took note of decisions taken in the Third Plenum which we consider as important progress regarding #humanrights. #EUChina

When a person makes a decision to engage in politics, he becomes a candidate by accepting the politics and internal discipline of the party for which he wishes to conduct politics.
If the person is very confident, he becomes an independent MP and speaks where he wants whatever he wants without being attached to a party.
The message of independence to the Lebanese people is transmitted at 8 pm today directly on the air and on the website of the Presidency of the Republic http://t.co/kOXrLLtDrD
It is difficult to talk about independence if we can not organize the parliamentary elections
Independence does not take root if the people do not move away from poverty and destitution and if the balanced development of the regions is not achieved and if the judiciary does not cease
It is not worth talking about independence if the state is unable to extend its authority over all the nation, and if the armed forces are not the sole occupier of the weapon
Independence does not take root if the people do not escape poverty and destitution and if balanced development of regions is not achieved
The independence state can not be decided by some parties to independence from the state
Independence can not be achieved if we continue to consolidate sectarianism and if we do not succeed in neutralizing ourselves from regional conflicts
At the disposal of the dialogue and the Lebanese, a vision of a defensive strategy that is the foundation of the Lebanese army
Return to the state and its logic and reference institutions to contribute to preserving our independence by word and deed
My deepest condolences to the family of Maurice "Mad Dog" Vachon, a Canadian wrestling legend.
I call upon each party and partner to return to their homeland and abide by the laws and provisions of the Constitution
We are keen to keep all our capabilities in the face of the Israeli enemy
I call on every partner in the country to return to the logic of the state and the institutions of reference and to withdraw immediately from the conflict in Syria
In my last speech of independence: Return to the state and its logic and reference institutions to contribute to the maintenance of our independence by word and deed
